attributes.action: Cancel the push to change pip to vouchers.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government wants to reform disability benefits system to ensure they’re targeted at those most in need. However their ideas of most in need is them. 

There is no thought or care for those who need help only blame.

Over 2.6 million people of working age now receiving PIP with monthly new claims almost doubling since 2019 costing the uk over £4 billion.

However unpaid taxes by politicians are costing us £35 billion.

Who is truly the issue?
attributes.background:
The change from money to vouchers of people claiming pip will be astronomical. The government is using the mental ill and disabled as a bouncing ball for their problems.

End the discussion on pip and make it so pip can not be touched

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660984
